about_the_game:
Search for your lost dog!

  • An extensive brand new story featuring mostly pixel graphics and an original soundtrack.
  • Made almost entirely by 1 person.
  • Fight crazy enemies in your path.
  • Hone your bullet hell skills in platforming challenges.
  • Explore this surreal fantasy world.
  • ...and meet the troubled creator of this fictional universe...

Try the free demo!

The demo features almost the entire prologue to an even larger story. The full game will take a long time to come out and will be released whenever it is complete.

Full game planned features:
  • An extensive story and large world to explore
  • Many enemies and bosses with unique platforming bullet hell challenges
  • NPCs with side quests and witty dialogue
  • A larger inventory with equiptable charms
  • Do chores
  • Boring real life stuff

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions ofsensitive themes including anxiety and self harm. Proceed with an open mind.

name: Dog Adventure Harmony Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: I copied a friends Steam game system requirements

short_description: A fictitious game where you search for your lost dog.
